Items.Name: ProposalCount
Documentation: Number of proposals that have been made.

Items.Name: Approvals
Documentation: Proposal indices that have been approved but not yet awarded.

Calls.Name: propose_spend
Documentation: Put forward a suggestion for spending. A deposit proportional to the value
is reserved and slashed if the proposal is rejected. It is returned once the

Calls.Name: reject_proposal
Documentation: Reject a proposed spend. The original deposit will be slashed.

Calls.Name: approve_proposal
Documentation: Approve a proposal. At a later time, the proposal will be allocated to the beneficiary
and the original deposit will be returned.

Events.Name: Spending
Documentation: We have ended a spend period and will now allocate funds. \[budget_remaining\]

Events.Name: Awarded
Documentation: Some funds have been allocated. \[proposal_index, award, beneficiary\]

Events.Name: Rejected
Documentation: A proposal was rejected; funds were slashed. \[proposal_index, slashed\]

Events.Name: Burnt
Documentation: Some of our funds have been burnt. \[burn\]

Events.Name: Rollover
Documentation: Spending has finished; this is the amount that rolls over until next spend.

Constants.Name: ProposalBond
Documentation: Fraction of a proposal's value that should be bonded in order to place the proposal.
An accepted proposal gets these back. A rejected proposal does not.

Constants.Name: ProposalBondMinimum
Documentation: Minimum amount of funds that should be placed in a deposit for making a proposal.

Constants.Name: Burn
Documentation: Percentage of spare funds (if any) that are burnt per spend period.

Constants.Name: PalletId
Documentation: The treasury's pallet id, used for deriving its sovereign account ID.

Constants.Name: MaxApprovals
Documentation: The maximum number of approvals that can wait in the spending queue.

Errors.Name: InvalidIndex
Documentation: No proposal or bounty at that index.

Errors.Name: TooManyApprovals
Documentation: Too many approvals in the queue.
